attributes.action: not allow Baby P's parents life to be funded by taxpayers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
These two sick people want to be relocated to Canada when they leave prison at the cost of 1 MILLION POUNDS, at the taxpayers expense. 

The step-dad also has a list of things he wants when he gets out like flat screen TV's , tattoos, again at the taxpayers expense. 

The mother also wants 24-hour police protection, yet again funded by the taxpayer.

Why should we have to pay for it all?

rejection.details: Individual cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
